H0.text: Freezes causes snow to turn to liquid water.

H1.text: Melts is what causes snow to turn to liquid water.

H2.text: Condenses is the process that causes snow to turn into liquid water.

H3.text: Evaporates is the process by which snow turns to liquid water.

A4.text: Melting is a physical process that results in the phase transition of a substance from a solid to a liquid.
